name: saas-ecommerce
description: SaaS Ecommerce Multi-Nicho - Sistema adaptável para lanchonetes, moda, infoprodutos e varejo

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:admin" "npm run dev:ecommerce"
scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:packages: npm run --workspace=@ecommerce/types build && npm run --workspace=@ecommerce/utils build && npm run --workspace=@ecommerce/ui build && npm run --workspace=@ecommerce/api-client build
scripts.build:frontend: npm run --workspace=@ecommerce/admin build && npm run --workspace=@ecommerce/store build && npm run --workspace=@ecommerce/landing build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:frontend: npm run --workspace=@ecommerce/admin test && npm run --workspace=@ecommerce/store test
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:frontend: npm run --workspace=@ecommerce/admin lint && npm run --workspace=@ecommerce/store lint
scripts.type-check: npm run --workspace=@ecommerce/types build && npm run --workspace=@ecommerce/utils build && npm run --workspace=@ecommerce/ui build && npm run --workspace=@ecommerce/api-client build
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run build:packages && echo '✅ Setup completo! Execute npm run dev para iniciar o desenvolvimento'
scripts.fresh: npm run clean && npm run setup

author: Your Name
